spec_data.Name: python2-pology
spec_data.Description:
Pology is a Python library for in-depth processing of PO files,
which are the predominant medium for translation of free
software and associated documents.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Sun 26 Feb 2017 10:46:26 AM EST, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Tool for looking at the entry point plugins on a system
